item.title: Funpk (b0x) need help
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

Im going to try = )[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 17, 2009, 06:55:54 am[/size][hr]Didn’t work…

But i got another code with a problem it freezs me if i die then i need to relog = (

[code] // If killed apply dead
if ((absX >= 1111 && absX <= 1111 && absY >= 1111 && absY <=

1111 && IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1)) {
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]),
playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
refreshSkills();
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
teleportToX = 3090;
teleportToY = 3934;
sendMessage("you have died at the fight pits, log out and

in to move.");
}
else if (IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1) {
refreshSkills();
ApplyDead();
}
// update correct hp in stat screen
if (NewHP < 136) {
playerLevel[playerHitpoints] = NewHP;
setSkillLevel(playerHitpoints, NewHP, playerXP

[playerHitpoints]);
NewHP = playerLevel[3];
}[/code]

item.title: Funpk (b0x) need help
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Should work. (It will put the items on the floor AND in the inventory. So, both players get something :-))

[code]public void youdied() {
for (int r = 0; r < playerEquipment.length; r++) {
try {
int item = playerEquipment[r];

            if ((item > 0) && (item < 20000)) {
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment");
        }
    }
    for (int rr = 0; rr < playerItems.length; rr++) {
        try {
            if (playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 20000) {
                // createItem(currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1);
                ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[rr] - 1, absX, absY,
                        playerItemsN[rr], KillerId, false);
                // createGroundItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[i]);
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {}
    }
    for (int r = 0; r < playerEquipment.length; r++) {
        try {
            int item = playerEquipment[r];

            if ((item > 0) && (item < 20000)) {
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment");
        }
    }
    for (int rr = 0; rr < playerItems.length; rr++) {
        try {
            if (playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 20000) {
                // createItem(currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1);
                ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[rr] - 1, absX, absY,
                        playerItemsN[rr], KillerId, false);
                // createGroundItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[i]);
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {}
    }
    teleportToX = 3428;
    teleportToY = 2891;
    // pEmote = 15;
    // pWalk = 13;
    sendMessage("Oh dear you, you have died!");
    hitDiff = 0;	
    updateRequired = true;
    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}[/code]

item.title: Funpk (b0x) need help
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

I wanna have a funpk (box) that if you die you dont lose stuff this is my youdied method:

[code]public void youdied() {
for (int r = 0; r < playerEquipment.length; r++) {
try {
int item = playerEquipment[r];

            if ((item > 0) && (item < 20000)) {
                remove(item, r);
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment");
        }
    }
    for (int rr = 0; rr < playerItems.length; rr++) {
        try {
            if (playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 20000) {
                // createItem(currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1);
                ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[rr] - 1, absX, absY,
                        playerItemsN[rr], KillerId, false);
                // createGroundItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[i]);
                deleteItem(playerItems[rr] - 1,
                        getItemSlot(playerItems[rr] - 1), playerItemsN[rr]); 
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {}
    }
    removeAllItems();
    for (int r = 0; r < playerEquipment.length; r++) {
        try {
            int item = playerEquipment[r];

            if ((item > 0) && (item < 20000)) {
                remove(item, r);

deleteItem(6570, getItemSlot(6570), 1);
sendMessage(“Your Fire Cape vanishes as it hits the floor”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sendMessage(“ERROR: Removing Equipment”);
}
}
for (int rr = 0; rr < playerItems.length; rr++) {
try {
if (playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 20000) {
// createItem(currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1);
ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[rr] - 1, absX, absY,
playerItemsN[rr], KillerId, false);
// createGroundItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[i]);
deleteItem(playerItems[rr] - 1,
getItemSlot(playerItems[rr] - 1), playerItemsN[rr]);
}
} catch (Exception e) {}
}
removeAllItems();
teleportToX = 3428;
teleportToY = 2891;
// pEmote = 15;
// pWalk = 13;
sendMessage(“Oh dear you, you have died!”);
hitDiff = 0;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}[/code] But how can i make it funzone now??
Plz help!
